basics.name: Jaeung Jang
basics.summary: I want to know everything about what is happeing on this world
basics.objective: Senior year computer science student at Virginia Tech. Seeking to leverage creative thinking and strong design implementation skills to ensure the functionalities of the product on time.

summary.point: Built an interactive map showing housing affordability index of different counties in VA and a line graph showing the changes of the indexes of a chosen county over time using D3 for data visualization and React for user interfaces
Implemented selection box for rendering county data and sliders for limiting what data to visualize
Acquired data synchronization between map and the graph through the usage of state and props; setState is triggered by clicking a county on the map which populates selected county data to the graph

experiences.title: Young Generation Technical and Leadership Confeernce 2020 Website

summary.point: Designed a website for a 16th YGTLC (AKA Ygnite) held at Seattle
Managed early boost on designing phase and easiness of knowledge transfer for the next year using Weebly
Acquired agile building process by adapting improvements and communicating frequently to share up-to-date information within a team to deliver the best working product
Experimented well-known web attacks on a controlled environment
Established SQL injection attack on a test website by injecting a query sentence in a login form, without the presence of password
Tracked user activity through CSRF attack; mimicked a page redirects to the valid website with the account under the attackerâ€™s control
Established XSS attack by injecting malicious JavaScript code at the end of the get method URL
Examined designing process of an application with a group of 6
Conducted requirement analysis based on both functional and non-functional requirements
Used markup tool, Moqups, for the overall design of the application
Brainstormed required classes for UML diagram
Wrote pseudocode for the required classes
Deployed a React based website application on a server with functionalities include login, logout, displaying questions along with the choices
Ensured security of the login through the usage of RSA public and private key pair
Displayed questions and associated choices with user selection option, and a bar graph showing overall user selections
Designed REST architecture for the backend with node.js to handle server requests effectively and managed data with MySQL

activities.title: Origami blog
activities.summary: Communicated and shared knowledge with other people from the blog and actively uploaded own origami designs and associated instructions

activities.title: Origami Diagram publication
activities.summary: Sliced Orange - Korea Origami Convention book 2016
